description.value: At 1st level, you can touch an ally and grant it a glorious blessing. For 1 minute, the ally becomes mesmerizing to her foes. This functions as @Compendium[pf1.spells.yk5bgi6j9kbtigof]{Sanctuary}, except if the ally attacks an opponent, this effect ends with respect to only that opponent. This is a mind-affecting effect.
